UNICASE

http://code.google.com/p/unicase/

UNICASE is a SWT application and a plugin for the Eclipse Integrated Development Environment. UNICASE is a CASE-tool (a Computer-Aided Software Engineering tool) that supports modeling artifacts of a software engineering project. The software use a database but can be a local database or a distant database.


Nicolas James 2011-07-19
